channel.title: Plan on vtemian - blog
channel.description: Recent content in Plan on vtemian - blog

item.title: Interviews
item.description: I’m really nervous, only thinking of them. I had only one or two real interviews and conducted a few. Usually, I’m pretty lucky when it comes to job finding. The companies I like or want to work with contacted me, and it’s really flattering. No interview, just a small discussion, a beer and I’ll start next Monday. For the past 2.5 years, I’ve started practicing. Practicing maybe it’s too much.
